column2: This 10 foot by 20 foot entry hall has stone walls with a Door on the east side leading to another room.
This 20 foot by 30 foot dinning area has Velvet Elvis Paintings with a Door on the south wall leading to another room.
This 40 foot by 50 foot dance studio has Mirrored Walls with a Door on the west wall leading to another room.
This 20 foot by 20 foot arcade has posters of Metallica with a Door on the north wall leading to another room. Cletus is gently restrained in a comfy chair.
